GSD.product_version: versions from v4.13 to before v5.10.110
GSD.description:
lib/test: use after free in register_test_dev_kmod()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.110 by commit 327f07e3704c821ce33e54ef5046bdf69975cb86, it was introduced in version v4.13 by commit d9c6a72d6fa29d3a7999dda726577e5d1fccafa5. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: lib/test: use after free in register_test_dev_kmod()
